message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I believe will bring you great value. After careful consideration, I'm willing to let it go for a price that I think is fair and reasonable.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of a lower price. I'd like to make a counteroffer to see if we can meet in the middle.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of a higher price, considering the product's value to you. I'd like to make a counteroffer to see if we can meet in the middle.

Hi Alice, thank you for your new offer. I appreciate the slight reduction in price. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make another counteroffer to see if we can meet at a mutually agreeable price.

Hi Bob, thank you for your new counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. However, I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'd like to make another counteroffer to see if we can meet in the middle.
Hi Alice, thank you for your new offer. I can see that we're getting closer to a mutually agreeable price. I'd like to make another counteroffer to see if we can finalize the deal.
